snippet: Gov. Andrew Cuomo should be ready to campaign against any lawmaker who resists his crucial reforms, including public financing of New York elections.
abstract: Editorial contends New York Gov Andrew Cuomo must be ready to campaign against any lawmaker, Republican or Democrat, who resists his announced package of reforms that address corruption; holds reforms will be effective, particularly those that address the state's campaign financing system.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew Cuomo should be ready to campaign against any lawmaker who resists his crucial reforms, including public financing of New York elections.
